content.name: &#34;Avalanche&#34;
content.text1:
Damages Snowmen
:Damages Snowmen. Deals damage to your target in a single large burst.
content.text2:
Damages Snowmen
:Damages Snowmen. Deals a large amount of damage to your target, and all targets near the impact site.

content.name: &#34;Flurry&#34;
content.text1:
Damages Snowmen
:Damages Snowmen. Deals a small amount of damage in 3 short bursts.
content.text2:
Damages Snowmen
:Damages Snowmen. Deals a small amount of damage to all targets in a narrow frontal cone.

content.name: &#34;Freezing Mist&#34;
content.text1:
Freezing Beam
: Damages Snowmen. Deals damage over a few seconds to one target at short range.
content.text2:
Cone AoE Damage
: Damages Snowmen. Deals heavy damage to several targets in a wide cone in front of you.
: 6 sec recharge

content.name: &#34;Hail&#34;
content.text1:
Damages Snowmen
:Damages Snowmen. Deals a moderate amount of damage to your target.
content.text2: Expose Attack
content.text3:
Damages Snowmen
:Damages Snowmen. Deals a large amount of damage to all enemies in a cone centered on your target.

content.name: "Improvise"
content.text1:
Single Target Ranged Attack
:If player targeted:
:* Slight increase to Run Speed, but Traction is reduced.
:* The target of your snowball will receive a half-melted one they can throw at a target of their choosing (Lasts 5 minutes before melting)
:If snowman targeted:
:* Deals damage. (Snowballs seem to be the only "weaponry" that affects them.)
content.text2:
Targetted Cone AoE Damage
:If player targeted:
:* Slight increase to Run Speed, but Traction is reduced.
:* The target of your snowball will receive a half-melted one they can throw at a target of their choosing (Lasts 5 minutes before melting)
:If snowman targeted:
:* Deals damage. (Snowballs seem to be the only "weaponry" that affects them.)

content.text2:
Damages Snowmen
:Damages Snowmen. Deals a moderate amount of damage to all targets in front of you.

content.text1:
Damages Snowmen

content.text2:
Damages Snowmen
:Deals heavy damage to one target at a long range.

Damages Snowmen

content.text2:
Damages Snowmen
:Damages Snowmen. Deals a large amount of damage to all targets in front of you.

content.name: 100% Discount Coupon: Tier 6 Ship
content.text1:
This Coupon allows you to claim a single Tier 6 Starship[[100% Discount Coupon: Tier 6 Ship#cite_note-1|'''*''']] in the [[Zen Store]].


Navigate to the Zen Store to review the selection of Starships available to you. To navigate to the Zen Store, you can click on the '''"[[File:Zen small icon.png|15px|link=Zen]]STORE"''' button attached to the bottom of your minimap. 


<span id="cite_note-1"><span class="reference-text">'''''* Some exclusions may apply. Ships found in the New Items section of the Zen Store cannot be purchased with this coupon.'''''</span></span> (Event Version Only)

content.text1: +15% Exotic Damage
content.text2: +2% Exotic Damage Critical Chance
content.text3:
Summon Causal Anchor
: Create a pair of level __ Temporal Anomalies for 30 sec
: Temporal Anomaly (3 km radius)
: * Slowly move toward one another
: * ____ Physical Damage per sec (ignores shields)
: ** ''(Damage increases as Anomalies get closer to one another''
: * -0.21 Repel
: * When two Anomalies come in contact with one another (or after 30 sec)
: ** _____ Physical Damage (100% Shield Penetration) to up to 5 targets within 3km
: ** 30 Repel to up to 5 targets within 3km

content.text2:

: * + ___ Hull Healing every 1 sec for 15 sec
: * + ___ Shield Healing every 1 sec for 15 sec

::''(Effects scale with stacks of Chronotachyon Capacitance charges)''

: ** +25-50% Critical Severity for 15 sec
: * Incoming Energy Damage adds:
: ** To self +1 '''Chronotachyon Capacitance''' counter for 15 sec (Stacks up to 20 times)

content.name: Elite Services Bundle
content.text1:
Contains multiple service options, designed to increase your character's capacity in multiple ways. Select and choose "More Details" to view details of its contents.<br><br>''More Details'':<br><br><span style="color:gold">'''** Rewarded as part of Special Promotion. Each item received from this opening this package will be Character Bound.'''</span><small>'"`UNIQ--nowiki-00000000-QINU`"'[[w:Sic|''sic'']]'"`UNIQ--nowiki-00000001-QINU`"'</small><br><br>The contents of this bundle contains various options for increasing the storage capacity of your character in various ways. Each improvement will be received as a separate account-tradeable package if you are already at your maximum capavity.<br><br>This package contains the following items:
&#42; 36 Inventory Slots

&#42; 36 Bank Slots

&#42; 2 Bridge Officer Slots

content.name: First Contact Day Badge Box
content.text1:
This container holds a selection of Comm Badges which will unlock for all characters on your Account upon receipt. They may be applied to your costume by visiting the Tailor. Each time you receive this reward, you may choose one from the following list:
* Andorian Badge
* Bajoran Religious Badge
* Benzite Badge
* Betazoid Badge
* Bolian Badge
* Caitian Badge
* Earth (Human) Badge
* Ferengi Badge
* Klingon Badge
* Liberated Borg Badge
* Pakled Badge
* Rigelian Badge
* Saurian Badge
* Tellarite Badge
* Trill Badge
* Trill Symbiosis Commission Badge
* Vulcan Badge

'''''If you already have all of the above, or are a member of an allegiance that cannot wear these, you will instead receive a Skillpoint Boost.''''' '''Note: These badges generally will only be wearable on Federation uniforms.

content.Page: Ground Non-Combat Pet Pack - Elachi Skitterer Companion
content.name: Ground Non-Combat Pet Pack - Elachi Skitterer Companion
content.text1:
Non-combat pet. The engineer supplying this vendor with reprogrammed Skitterer drones has not seen fit to mark the crates externally with an indication of the specific chasis style kept within each crate.
 
Although usually seen used by the Elachi as a form of autonomous shock trooper1 these Skitterers have been stripped of their weaponry and combat subroutines and reprogrammed to resemble mechanical “pets” similar to those kept by the children of many cultures. They have been 
extensively tested to ensure that no trace of their original programming has survived this process of domestication. 

Your Pet is currently packed up. Inspect and use this item to unpack it. Once Unpacked, you will be able to tell what chassis type you have obtained. You will still have the choice whether to trade it, or claim it for your own use.

content.Page: Ground Non-Combat Pet Pack - Khellid Companion
content.name: Ground Non-Combat Pet Pack - Khellid Companion
content.text1: Contains a random breed of Khellid Companion.<br/><br/>Right Click and Use this item to Unpack. Once Unpacked, you cannot trade your Pet<small>'"`UNIQ--nowiki-00000000-QINU`"'[[w:Sic|''sic'']]'"`UNIQ--nowiki-00000001-QINU`"'</small>. You may only own one of these pets at a time, so if you already own one, you will not bet ablte to unpack this item.

content.name: Q&#39;s Ornament: Avalanche!

content.text2: Usable only in Q's Winter Wonderland

content.text1: Creates Snowman Defense. Useful for Completing "Tides of Ice" event.
content.text2: Usable only in Q's Winter Wonderland

content.text2: Usable only in Q's Winter Wonderland

content.name: Risian Tropical Bird Egg
content.text1: This appears to be an egg belonging to one of the many vibrant-colored tropical birds that call Risa their home. Since this egg was laying in an unguarded nest, it's safe to presume that whichever bird it laid it has since abandoned it to local predators. Better you should find it, than to have it destroyed.
content.text2: There is a Researcher at the Resort that can help you use these to obtain unique breeds of Risian Tropical Birds.
content.text3: '''Acquired from the Horga'hn Scavenger Hunt held on Risa during the Summer Event.'''
content.text4: '''Used for special Duty Officer Assignments to obtain tropical bird vanity pets'''

content.Page: Special Requisition Pack - Breen Chel Grett Warship
content.name: Special Requisition Pack - Breen Chel Grett Warship
content.text1:
In 2375, the Breen first entered the Dominion War at the Second Battle of Chin'toka. It was in this terrible battle that Breen's power and ruthlessness was first observed. The Second Battle of Chin'toka was the worst defeat for the Federation Alliance and over 99 percent of allied ships were lost, including the U.S.S. Defiant.<br><br>
This battle was the first time the Alliance had faced the Breen Energy Dissipator - also known as an Energy Dampening weapon. This single piece of technology almost allowed the Dominion forces to win the war and the Alpha Quadrant. But even without the Energy Dissipator, the Breen Chel Grett is a formidable Warship, and it is extremely maneuverable for its size.<br><br>
The Breen Chel Grett Warship comes with an Energy Dissipator console which fires a targetable Energy Dissipating Blast that causes significant subsystem drain and has a chance to knock a single subsystem offline for a short duration. The Energy Dissipator can be equipped in any console slot on any Breen ship.<br><br>
* Hull Strength: 36,000
* Shield Modifier: 1
* Crew: 650
* Weapons: 4 Fore, 4 Aft
* Device Slots: 3
* Bridge Officer Stations: 1 Lieutenant Tactical, 1 Commander Tactical, 1 Lieutenant Engineering, 1 Lieutenant Commander Science, 1 Ensign Universal
* Console Modifications: 4 Tactical, 3 Engineering, 3 Science
* Base Turn Rate: 13 degrees per second
* Impulse Modifier: 0.18
* +10 Power to Weapons; +5 Power to Engines
* Can Load Cannons
* Breen Energy Dissipator Universal Console<br><br>
Your ship is currently packed up. Right Click and Use this item to Unpack.

content.name: Starter Pack - Care Package
content.text1:
Starting a new Federation captain and want to launch their career at warp 9? Add a Federation Starter Pack and enter the Alpha Quadrant with all of the gear you'll need to take on the Klingon Empire! Included in the pack:


* One XP Boost that will provide a single character with a 20 percent increase in the amount of Experience Points earned up to a maximum of 1,000<sup>(sic)</sup> Experience Points.
* Federation Graduate [[Title]]
* Mk II [[Phaser Full Auto Rifle]] [CrtH][KB1]
* Mk II [[Personal Shield]] [Cap]
* Mk II [[Energy Dampening Armor]] [RegHP]
* Mk II [[Photon Torpedo Launcher]] [Acc][Dmg]
* Mk II [[Resilient Shield Array]] [Cap]
* Human Female Engineering Bridge Officer Candidate (Uncommon Quality) equipped with a Mk II [[Phaser Pulsewave Assault]] [CrtH], Mk II Personal Shield [Cap] and Mk II Energy Dampening Armor [Dis]
* Betazoid Female Science Bridge Officer Candidate (Uncommon Quality) equipped with a Mk II [[Phaser Assault Minigun]] [CrtH], Mk II Personal Shield [Cap] and Mk II Energy Dampening Armor [Dis]
* 5 [[Weapons Battery|Weapons Batteries]]
* 5 [[Shields Battery|Shield Batteries]]
* 5 [[Engine Battery|Engine Batteries]]
* 5 [[Auxiliary Battery|Auxiliary Batteries]]
* 10 [[Medium Hypo]]sprays
* 10 [[Medium Shield Charge]]s
* 10 [[Medium Power Cell]]s

content.name: Starter Pack - Care Package Consumables
content.text1:
A bundle of consumable items for new Federation captains.


Included in this pack:



* 5 Weapons Batteries
* 5 Shield Batteries
* 5 Engine Batteries
* 5 Auxiliary Batteries
* 10 Medium Hyposprays
* 10 Medium Shield Charges
* 10 Medium Power Cells

content.name: Statis Shell - Short (Advanced)
content.text1: This item is a Competitive Consumable, usable inside PvP and Competitive PvE maps.
content.text2:
This consumable will shield the user from harm temporarily but will prevent them from attacking as well. It can only be used during PvP and Competitive PvE matches.
:Targets Self
:0.25 sec activate
:1 min recharge
:1/1 charges (max stack: 20)
:For Ground and Space:
:*to self: Hold for 3 sec
:*to self: Regeneration disabled
:For Ground:
:*Temporary Hit Points equal to 600% of Max Hitpoints for 10 sec
:For Space:
:''(Must be at zero throttle to activate)''
:*Temporary Hit Points equal to 500% of Max Hull Hitpoints for 10 sec<br><br>
:(Effect can be ended early by moving after Hold ends)<br><br>
:Skills that affect this ability:
:none

content.text4:
Rift Near Target: Pulls Foes and Creates Debuffing Bubles
: Summons a level _ Fluidic Rift within 2km of your target.
<br>
: Fluidic Rift:
: * Gradually pulls nearby enemies closer
: * Periodically releases Fluidic Puddles
: * After 30 seconds, Rift explodes dealing _ Kinetic Damage to all enemies within 1km
: Fluidic Puddles:
: * Wander randomly near the Rift that spawned them
: * Reduces enemy Flight Speed, Turn Rate and Accuracy for 10 seconds
: * Causes _ Plasma Damage to enemies every 0.5 sec
: * Dissipate after 30 seconds
